entry.title: embrujado
entry.summary:
Author: pottersxredheads

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,310Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 0

Summary: They're coming up the front path, laughing about Marisol's favourite joke from the movie - a stupid bit about the wine glass getting bigger in every scene - when she opens the door and - Christopher's breath hitches. There's a split-second - a single, splintered fragment of a moment, where Christopher's seven years old again, and his Mom's just come home for Christmas. "Mom?" he breathes. She's frozen. And then he looks at his Dad. His eyes - they're petrified, frantic. Christopher's not seven. It's not Christmas. His world comes crashing to an end. or: five times Christopher Diaz sees a ghost, and one time his Dad sees one.

entry.title: The Home We Build
entry.summary:
Author: happinesscomeswithus

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,217Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 17

Summary: After everything — the calls, the chaos, the long nights and close calls — Buck and Eddie finally get the one thing they’ve never had: peace.  Newly engaged and living in the house they chose together, they’re building a life defined not by emergencies, but by morning muffins, garden plans, FaceTime with family, and the quiet love that grows in the in-between. For Eddie, it’s a slow unraveling of old expectations — exploring softness, femininity, and what it means to be fully seen.This is a story of healing, queerness, domesticity, found family, and the tender joy of a life you don’t have to brace yourself against.  No firestorms. No cliffhangers. Just a steady heartbeat of home.

entry.title: P.S: I Hate You (but not really, not at all)
entry.summary:
Author: Monogums

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,233Chapters: 15/16Kudos: 148

Summary: "Maybe I wouldn't be doing this if I didn't have to listen to every rendition of Baby Shark for two hours straight!" Eddie says, jabbing his finger in Buck's face. Buck glowers. "Like you can talk, how many times do you have to sing the multiplication song to not be off key?" Ravi's groan is earth-shattering. "Can you guys please get out of my classroom?" - Or: in which Buck teaches elementary school, and the new second grade teacher is the last person he ever wanted to see.

entry.title: I Will Defy Gravity Simply To Hold You One More Time
entry.summary:
Author: Queen_of_the_northern_light

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,472Chapters: 6/8Kudos: 25

Summary: During NASA’s latest Mars Mission an astronaut becomes stranded on the desolated planet after his team assumes him dead, and he must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and to survive a potential rescue. Hope and survival really aren’t on his side, but he has a family to make it back to. Death isn’t an option; however fatal his situation may be, he is willing to defy everything known to man for a chance of holding the love of his life one more time. And Christopher, he desperately wants to return to his son as well. Or in which Eddie refuses to die, if he must fight the very knowledge of reality and physics, so be it. The whole world is watching as he and Buck literally change the definition of Star-Crossed Lovers for the rest of eternity.

entry.title: why'd you have to chase the light? (somewhere I can't go)
entry.summary:
Author: strawberryshoyo

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,458Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 40

Summary: -real? Just one word. Such a simple text that managed to hold so much weight. The text glowed back at him. Unanswered. Bobby always answered. Slowly, pieces of the day fell into place. Why he had felt so disoriented, why the station seemed wrong, why everything felt so out of place. A strange, almost hysterical bubble of joy rose in his chest. Bobby wasn’t dead. He couldn’t be dead. Why? Because Buck was still dreaming. He hadn’t woken up from his coma yet.   Or the one where Buck is struggling to accept Bobby's death, so his mind decides not to. (Bobby does not stay dead in this. He is presumed to be at first)

entry.title: what if I told you that...
entry.summary:
Author: buckleyioncourt

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,004Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 14

Summary: Scary? Of all the reactions Eddie had pictured Buck having, thinking this was scary was not one of them. “Scary?” Eddie echoed. “Wh-yeah? Someone’s pretending to be you.” Buck enunciated his next words pointedly, though gently. “You’re-you're being used. As...as a catfish.” Buck’s statement carried the cadence of a middle school math teacher reminding her pre-algebra class that two plus two equals four. Like it was an obvious, fundamental truth. There could be no other possibility. Oh. Buck thinks my profile is a catfish. or Buck and Eddie both have Hinge profiles. Buck and Eddie are in love with each either. Neither one of these idiots knows any of this information about the other.

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 491,089Chapters: 55/?Kudos: 66

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: Just one more breath
entry.summary:
Author: CarpeDiem911

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,341Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 240

Summary: The hysterical laughter stole every coherent thought from Buck and crawled into his bones; his heart thudded and he stared at the doll in disbelief. Then, as suddenly as it had started, the laughter stopped; leaving an eerie silence. Buck stood frozen, his thoughts like thick mud, staring at that stupid doll. He completely missed the huge hole in the wall above the tub. He missed the shadow standing there, watching him from behind the hole with cold eyes and a malicious smile.

entry.title: I know the places you'll be safe
entry.summary:
Author: Buddieforever1111

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,819Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: All they had shared were kisses, but it gave Buck hope. He’s had a pretty easy mindset during his childhood and long into his adulthood, but now in this moment, he has something to hold onto. He just didn’t think it would be in the form of the man he’s sworn to protect. The possibility of him doing both is so surreal to him. It’s always been one way or the other. You get the job done and sadly can’t let your emotions get in the way of completing your mission, but is this the only time he’s able to love Eddie and protect him all the same, or will his emotions get the best of him? Only time will tell if he can truly have his happy ending, or if his father will be right and he’ll lose Eddie forever. Or... Buck grew up as a trained, ruthless mercenary under his father, and his father sold his son's skills to Eddie's father to protect Eddie with his life. What happens now that the threat has caught up with him? Can he still keep Eddie safe? Or will he lose the only person he would ever love because he dragged him into this?

entry.title: Pineapple juice and love
entry.summary:
Author: Baileyloves911

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,343Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 32

Summary: Buck smooths Eddie’s hair back gently. “You feeling okay?” Eddie blinks up at him like he’s trying to focus on a sunrise. “Buck… I need to tell you something important” Buck bites his lip to keep from laughing. “I’m right here” Eddie leans in dramatically. “I… am gay.” Chris lets out an ungodly sound and slaps a hand over his mouth. Buck smiles warmly. “I know, honey” Eddie blinks. Or: Eddie gets his wisdom teeth removed and is very unhinged the whole time.

entry.title: For What is Grief If Not Our Love with Nowhere to go?
entry.summary:
Author: KeeperOfDragons

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,907Chapters: 7/30Kudos: 269

Summary: Grief: A very great sadness, especially at the death of someone-But that's not what grief means to many people, to the members of the 118 they would describe Grief as their love with nowhere to go.Love so deep and different for each person who loved, and was loved by him.For who wouldn't love Evan "Buck" Buckley?OrWhen the Lab incident occurs, it is not Bobby Nash who is stuck behind the glass but the man he saw as his son. Evan "Buck" Buckley. This is the story of the supposed ‘death’ of Evan “Buck” Buckley. In which 118 realizes just what he meant to them, and perhaps just what they’d do to bring him back.

entry.title: the space between us
entry.summary:
Author: toribucklydiazz

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,562Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 52

Summary: When a fight tears Buck and Eddie apart, Buck is left drowning in a loneliness he’s spent years trying to outrun. But Christopher’s message pulls him back into the one place he’s terrified to return to — the Diaz home, and the family he’s afraid he’s losing.Under Christmas lights, with old wounds exposed and truths finally spoken, Buck and Eddie face the distance between them… and decide whether to close it for good.   or: Eddie and Buck had a fight but Christopher brings them back together.
